item.title: AGU 2022 Materials
item.description: “Tracking Evaporation Evolution in Soil Columns using Dose Reduced Neutron Tomography” Contact E-mail: michael.daugherty@nist.gov Poster number: B25H-1638 Authors: M.C. Daugherty, J.M. LaManna, S. Zeng, Y. Kim1, D.S. Hussey, E. Baltic, D.L. Jacobson, Y. Jin Links NeXT at NIST Instrument paper Other Soil Studies Supplemental Figures Improvement in segmentation accuracy with FBPConvNet over filtered back projection (FBP). The animation shows the progression of a single reconstruction slice through 7 rapid scans.
